st: Kaliyan Ishq Kaman Okha,
s:
Kaliyan Ishq Kaman Okha,
Kisay Nu Yar Bnana Okha,
Pyar Pyar Tay Har Koi Bollay,
Kar K Pyar Nibhana Okha,
Har Koi Dhukhan Tay Hass Lenda,
Kisay Da Dard Wadana Okha,
Gallan Nall Naye Rutbay Millday,
Jogi Bhesa Wadana Okha,
Koi Kisay Di Gall Naye Sunda,
Lokan Nu Samjhana Okha..

st: Eh Jind Ni Ini Sasti Sajna
s:
Eh Jind Ni Ini Sasti Sajna
Har Koi Ni Isda Haqdar Hunda
Koi Ved Hakeem Na Ilaaj Karda
Jo V Ishq Bimar Hunda
Jo Rooh De Vich Vass Gaya
Oh Ni Dil De Vicho Visar Hunda
Hor Ta Sanu Pata Ni Yaara
Par Shartan La Ke Ni Kadi Pyar Hunda

st: Aundi hai usdi yaad kise peer di tarah,
s:
Aundi hai usdi yaad kise peer di tarah,
Pathra nu cheer k kise teer di tarah!!
Eh sach hai kI mai Ranjha na ban sakya,
Per ohnu mai chahya ik heer di tarah!!..

st: Twada saya banke twada sath nibha waga
s:
Twada saya banke twada sath nibha waga
tu jithe vi jayegi tere piche aavaga
saya ta chadd janda hega sath andhere wich
lekin main andhere wich twada ujala ban jawaga.

st: Akhan de banure change nai hondi,
s:
Akhan de banure change nai hondi,
Dostan toun douri change nai hondi,
Kady Kady mileya v kar yarra,
Har vayle SMS nal gal puri nai hondi

st: Soh Rab Di Tenu Pyar Kita
s:
Soh Rab Di Tenu Pyar Kita
Hor Kise Nu Kade Bulaya Vi Nayi
Tenu Apni Samaj Ke Dil Dita
Hor Kise Te Dil Kade Aaya Hii Nahi
Pyar Tere De Butte Nu Pani Laya
Hor Butta Pyar Da Laya Hi Nayi
Teri Yaad Vich Rehnda Main Sher Likhda
Hor Aj Tak Sher Banaya Hi Nahi
Tu Keh Pagal Ya Keh Chhalla
Gusa Gallaa Teriya Da Kade Aaya Hii Nahi

st: Loki kehnde si oh changi nahi,asi fir vi uste aitbaar keeta,
s:
Loki kehnde si oh changi nahi,asi fir vi uste aitbaar keeta,
Ohda har bol pugaya,usnu aina pyaar keeta,
Ohne sathon jaan mang layi,asi zara na inkaar keeta,
Asi jaan kad k hath che rakh ditti,te ohne lain laggeyan vi nakhra hazaar keeta.

st: Mere Rabba Meri Gall Da Jwab Ta De,
s:
Mere Rabba Meri Gall Da Jwab Ta De,
Es Tutte Hoye Dil Da Ilaz Ta De,
Sari Beeti Hai Umar Meri Dukhan De Sahare,
Hor Kinne Dukh Likhe Ne Hisaab Ta De ?

st: Loki Ishq Ishq paye karde ne,
s:
Loki Ishq Ishq paye karde ne,
Asi Ishq de darbaar ja Bethe!!..
Loki ta nit nave yaar labhde,
Par asi ta labia yaar gava bethe!!.

st: Ishq Ishq Na Karyia Kar Ni, Vekh Ishq De Kare
s:
Ishq Ishq Na Karyia Kar Ni, Vekh Ishq De Kare
Es Ishq Ne Joban Rutte Kai Lutte Kai Mare
Ishq Kamavan Aye Jehre Niana De Vanjare
Jattan De Putt Jogi Ho Gaye Chadke Takt Hazare

st: Ishq Koi Cheez Nahi Dil Parchaan Di
s:
Ishq Koi Cheez Nahi Dil Parchaan Di
Ishq Ta Kala Hai Dil Lgaan Di
Ishq Da Soda Kade Keeta Nahi Janda
Eh Oh Jaam Hai Jo Peeta Nahi Janda
Ki Samjhava Main Oos Bedard Nu
Ishq Ho Janda Hai Kade Keeta Nahi Janda

st: Hasda Hasda Koi Jado Dil Tod Janda Ae
s:
Hasda Hasda Koi Jado Dil Tod Janda Ae
Os Same Bas Marna Yaad Aunda Ae
Beshaq Dil Cho Ohnu Kad Dinde Haan
Par Har Vaar Kyun Ohda Cheta Aunda Ae

st: Adhi Raat Dehleez Ute Ik Supna Aan Khlo Janda
s:
Adhi Raat Dehleez Ute Ik Supna Aan Khlo Janda
Aa Behnda Jad Oh Sahmne,Fir Sauna Aukha Ho Janda
Pyar Tere Da Dard Ve, Meri Naadi-Naadi Toh Janda
Sonh Rab Di Main Pyar Ni Kita, Eh Pyar Tan Aape Ho Janda

st: Tere Bhul Jaan Picho, Mere Rul Jaan Picho
s:
Tere Bhul Jaan Picho, Mere Rul Jaan Picho
Reh Gayi Bas Mere Kol Ik Tanhayi Ni
Vad Vad Khaave, Te Eh Jhalli V Na Jaave
Maut Naalo Jaape Mainu Buri Eh Judai Ni
Jado Peya C Pyar, Odo Khidi C Bahar
Tu Lagdi C Inj Jive Khuda Di Khudai Ni
Hun Jaave Kithe” Preet” Gaave Dukhan De Hi Geet
Kive Hou Terian Dittian Peedha Di Bharpai Ni

st: Hove supne ch tu te jagave koi na
s:
Hove supne ch tu te jagave koi na
Sochan meriya ch tu te bulave koi na,
Tere khayalan de mukaddme ch saza hoje
Hove umar qaid te chuddave koi na.

st: Maut de faristeyo , mainu lay jao iss jag vichon..
s:
Maut de faristeyo , mainu lay jao iss jag vichon..
Nahin te main naina vich, hanjuaan nu hi piroyi javaanga..
Hun taan lagda hai yaaroo, Eh safar zindagi da muk chala…
Zindagi taan meri ho na saki,Par main maut da ho hi javaanga.

st: Kash aapan mile na hunde,
s:
Kash aapan mile na hunde,
Phul armana de khide na hunde,
Lakh koshish karda haan taithon door rehen di,
Ki karan eh saaz nazdeekiyan de chide na hunde.

st: Baazi Jitt Ke Hun Asi Han Haar Chale,
s:
Baazi Jitt Ke Hun Asi Han Haar Chale,
Satt Apne Dil Te Ha Maar Chale,
Nai Bhulne Sajna Oh Din Sanu,
Jo Tere Sang Haan Guzaar Chale,
Marke Vi Karange Yaad Tenu,
Aisa Dil Wich Sama Ke Pyar Chale,
Je Koi Bhul Hove Tan Bakhs Devin,
Kar Salam Asi Jandi Vaar Chale,
Mulaqat Mukki Te Vichodda Suru Hoyea,
Uth Mehfilan Chon Ne Yaar Chale

st: Kismat Sadi Wich Gamm He Likhe Ne
s:
Kismat Sadi Wich Gamm He Likhe Ne
Dardan Naal Hai Dosti Sadi
Dukhaa Nu Sirf Assi He Mile Ne
Russ Jande Jado Darde E Dost V Satho
Fer William Mehkhaane Wall Turde Ne

st: Jad Sada Hunda Si Kehnda Si Phull Sanu,
s:
Jad Sada Hunda Si Kehnda Si Phull Sanu,
Hun Gairan Naal Laake Geya Ae Bhul Sanu,
Tera Badlan Pichon Asi Vi Rang Watagae Aa,
Fark Bas Ena Ae Pehlan Khile Si Ajj Murjha Gae Aa

st: Tanha Rehna Sikh Reha Haan Main
s:
Tanha Rehna Sikh Reha Haan Main
Mar Ke Jeena Sikh Reha Haan Main
Mangg Ke Lena Sikh Leya Ae Hun
Paa Ke Khona Sikh Reha Haan Main…

st: Meri Mehboob De Sau Nakhre.
s:
Meri Mehboob De Sau Nakhre.
Sau De Sau Vakhre Vakhre.
Pehele Gade Je Oh Hasdi “Dhaniya”
Duje Gade Hanjuaan De Katre.

st: Gaye Samundron Paar Kdon Fir Milde Ne
s:
Gaye Samundron Paar Kdon Fir Milde Ne
Khus Jande Jad Pyar Kdon Fir Milde Ne
Jeevan Ik Nadi Te Kande Apan Do
Adh Hoye Ik Vaar Kdon Fir Milde Ne
Ghazal Meri Da Anubhav Menu Ehi Kehnda
Shearan Varge Yaar Kdon Fir Milde Ne

st: Main Deeva Tu Meri Loh Kudiye.
s:
Main Deeva Tu Meri Loh Kudiye.
Main Phul Haan Tu Kushbo Kudiye.
Har Nakhre Ton Jaan Main Vaar Diyanga,
Bhaven Nakhre Ne Tere Sau Kudiye.
Mere Tassvar Da Visha Jad Bandi Tu,
Mainu Aaonda Bas Tera Moh Kudiye.
Har Janam “Dhanwant” Da Tere Laiee Hai,
Har Janam Laiee “Dhanwant” Di Ho Kudiye.

st: Dil Karda Ae Tere Kol Aa Ke Ruk Jaava
s:
Dil Karda Ae Tere Kol Aa Ke Ruk Jaava
Teri Bukkal Wich Rakh Ke Siir Muk Jaava
Hanju Ban Ke Digga Teriya Aakhaa Da
Tere Bulla De Kol Aa Ke Sukk Jaava

st: Dupatta laal chunari ka,
s:
Dupatta laal chunari ka,
Lipat kar tujh se rehta hai,
Meri pyaasi nigahoan par,
hamesha hasta rehta hai.

st: Na jane ohna de dil vich ki hai jo chup chaap bhul ke beh gaye ne,
s:
Na jane ohna de dil vich ki hai jo chup chaap bhul ke beh gaye ne,
kayi vaar ta rabb inj jaape ki oh sanu galat samajhke beh gaye ne
khud kehnde si sath nibhavange, aap hora de vass peh gaye ne,
rabba khush rakhhin sadde apneyan nu, jo sahnu yaad v karno

st: Kina ku sama laya ohna sanu bhulaun lai
s:
Kina ku sama laya ohna sanu bhulaun lai
Asin kade nai keha ohna nu sadi jindgi cho chale jane lai
Ohna ne ajj app hi kehta
Tenu dushman di lod nai tere apne hi kafi ne tainu rulaun lai….

st: Alfaaz Ohde Sanu Aje Tak Yaad Ne
s:
Alfaaz Ohde Sanu Aje Tak Yaad Ne
Ohde Sath Wale Pal Sade Dil Ch Abaad Ne
Dil Wich Wass Kinve Luttya C Sanu
Khwaab Mitti Bn Khure Paniyan Ch Yaad Ne
Bhul Gaye Jo Beetiyan Kahaniyan De Wang
Sanu Sajjan Pyare Oh Aje Tak Yaad Ne

st: Jag Di Reet, Preet Sadi Ne Bann Jana
s:
Jag Di Reet, Preet Sadi Ne Bann Jana
Heer Ranjhan Wangu Ishqe Da Tana Tan Jana
Tu Dinda Rahi Saath Bas Es Nimani Da
Mere Tan Saahan Ne Tere Sahan Naal Chlli Jana
